per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(1.6*time);
per_frame_3=wave_g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(4.1*time);
per_frame_4=wave_b = -1 + (1-wave_r + 1-wave_g);
per_frame_5=pfthresh = above(bass_att,pfthresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,pfthresh))*((pfthresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_6=pfdx_r = equal(pfthresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(pfthresh,2))*pfdx_r;
per_frame_7=pfdy_r = equal(pfthresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(pfthresh,2))*pfdy_r;
per_frame_8=rg1 = abs(sin(12*time));
per_frame_9=rg2 =  0.25*above(rg1,0.75) - 0.25*below(rg1,0.25) - 0.5*above(rg1,0.25)*below(rg1,0.5)+ 0.5*above(rg1,0.5)*below(rg1,0.75);
per_frame_10=rg3 = if(equal(pfthresh,2),rg2,rg3);
per_frame_11=//echo_zoom = echo_zoom + rg3;
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=wave_mystery = wave_mystery + 0.2*sin(5*time*bass_att);
per_frame_14=mv_r = mv_r + wave_g;
per_frame_15=mv_b = mv_b + wave_r;
per_frame_16=mv_g = mv_g + wave_b;
per_frame_17=ib_r = mv_r;
per_frame_18=ib_g = mv_b;
per_frame_19=ib_b = mv_g;
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=zoom = zoom + 0.0525*(cos(bass_att*(0.5*rad)*cos(rad*12))*tan(bass_att));
